title.text: Rodopi (Language and computers: Studies in practical linguistics

abstractContent.text: Books listed below that are marked with a † or an § have been selected for review in a future issue.
A † means that a reviewer has already been assigned.
Reviewers are still sought for those books marked with an §.
Readers who wish to be considered as reviewers for these or other books should contact the Book Review Editor, outlining their qualifications, at bookreviews@cljournal.org.
CRC Press, 2010, xxxiii+678 pp; hardbound, ISBN 978-1-4200-8592-1, $99.95 †Statistical Machine Translation
